span.style: font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(28, 30, 33);

span.span: GCPS provides 2 days of free meals on Mondays and 3 days of free meals on Wednesdays (breakfast & lunch) to all children through age 18 (or through 21 if enrolled in GCPS). Children MUST be present to receive the meals. Please contact 921-1421 x 17 or email clawson@gilesk12.net with questions. Thank you for your support in feeding children!

span.a: Facilities Needs Assessment Community Wide Meetings:

span.span: The meeting scheduled at Giles High School on Wednesday, March 18th, at 7:00 p.m. to share information about the Facilities Assessment process has been postponed. When we are able to reschedule this meeting, we will publish the new date and time. Thank you for your understandi

a.title: Parent Guide to School Age Res

span.style: font-size: small; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);
span.span: Governor Northam made the announcement today ordering that schools in the Commonwealth of Va. be closed for the remainder of the school year. DOE will be providing us more information in the coming days regarding graduation, credits, GPA, and continuity of learning. I know that you have as many questions as we do at this time, but as we receive information and are able to develop plans to move forward, we will pass this information along to you. If you have any questions, please let us know. Thanks.

div.div: We continue to monitor the global outbreak of Coronavirus Disease 2019 and all guidance from the Center for Disease Control, the Virginia Department of Health and the Virginia Department of Education.

a.title: Preschool Applications For VPI and Head Start Are Being Accepted for 2020-21

div.a: Preschool Applications For VPI and Head Start Are Being Accepted for 2020-21

div.div: Joanna Jackson - Giles County's 2020 Spelling Bee Winner
STEM: Enriching the Classroom Learning Environment
We are pleased to announce Accreditation has been earned by all schools for the 2019-20 School Year!

p.span:
The world is our classroom, and each student's potential is our challenge.
In order to achieve our Vision, we believe that:
•Maximizing the potential for every student's success as an adult is the
prime goal of instruction.
•Those responsible for delivering all facets of the educational program
should pursue professional growth and program of development.
•Each individual's potential is best achieved when the commitment to
education is made by the total community.

div.p: Welcome to Giles County Public Schools! I am so proud of our great school system and the many accomplishments achieved, the programs implemented and the efforts by so many people. It is a team of truly professional individuals that I'm proud to be associated with. To our many talented staff members, I thank you for your tremendous efforts and countless hours each and every day. To our parents and guardians, I thank you for your time and dedication to your students. Together, as a team, we are addressing challenges and achieving successes every day! Best wishes for a great school year!

div.div: 151 School Road, Pearisburg, VA 24134 | Phone 540-921-1421 | Fax 540-921-1424
